description:
Back on Earth, the Nadesico crew attempts to settle back into their old lives, despite the fact that Nergal is keeping a close eye on them. But the longer they stay on Earth, the more they begin to realize how important it is that they finish what they started on the Nadesico...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 『故郷[ふるさと]』と呼べる場所
